comment: Update: Jackson Cosko who leaked Senators personal info to the public is not an intern but a paid fellow staffer of Congresswoman Shelia Jackson Lee, who lied about him being on her payroll. Cosko, now arrested, faces years in prison, and Im sure will be singing soon.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (u / update-02
            :ARG2 (c / contrast-01
                  :ARG1 (ii / intern

                                    :op2 "Cosko")

                                          :poss (p3 / person

                                    :ARG2 (p4 / public))))
                  :ARG2 (p5 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Congress"))
                              :ARG2 (s2 / staff-01

                                                :op1 "Shelia"
                                                :op2 "Jackson"

                                          :ARG0-of (l2 / lie-08

                                                      :poss p6))))
                              :mod (f / fellow)

      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (f2 / face-01
                  :ARG0 (p9 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Cosko")
                        :ARG1-of (a2 / arrest-01
                              :time (n5 / now)))
                  :ARG1 (m2 / multiple
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (y / year))))
            :op2 (s3 / sing-01
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1-of (s4 / sure-02
                        :ARG0 ii3)
                  :time (s5 / soon))))
